Name: Core Iris
About the game: A team-based third-person shooter where your objective is to capture the enemy's flag. Enjoy interesting mobility and fast-paced gameplay as you BUILD your way to the top. In this game, play as 5 separate characters each with their own special ability (coming soon), and fight an opposing team while defending your flag. Fight as a team and win as a team.
Meta Title: Core Iris: May 20, 2022, Joseph Lodge and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Core Iris? Check out the release date (May 20, 2022), developer insights from Joseph Lodge, and a complete game summary.
